# usheUtils <img src="man/figures/README-ut_ie_logo.png" align="right" width="120" />

<!-- badges: start -->

The goal of usheUtils is to build a package containing all the functions needed for the USHE reporting for the Office Of Insitutional Effectiveness at Utah Tech University.

## Installation

You can install the development version of usheUtils from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("dsu-effectiveness/usheUtils")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(usheUtils)
## basic example code
```
